p: We did a longitudinal cohort study. We studied two groups of healthy children: one from Ghana and one from Mali. Both groups are subsets of the study populations in trials of the meningococcal group A conjugate vaccine, MenAfriVac, administered to infants in association with other local Expanded Programme on Immunization vaccines, namely the PsATT-004 (phase 2, ISRCTN82484612) and Pers-004 (phase 4, ISRCTN10763234) studies in Ghana and the PsATT-007 (phase 3, PACTR201110000328305) and Pers-007 (phase 4, ISRCTN37623829) studies in Mali ( appendix p 2).
